==Useful Info==
'''Naga warriors''' are stronger, beefier, and better equipped than ordinary [[naga (monster)|nagas]]. They deal significant damage in melee, and can boost the melee damage of other nagas and salamanders nearby. You can find them throughout the [[Snake Pit]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Naga warriors are strong, high HP brutes. Try to soften or kill them at range. If things get sketchy, remember that all nagas move slowly - you can walk away. Also remember that nagas [[constrict]], which prevents movement.
*Much like [[orc knight]]s, their Battlecry greatly amplifies the melee damage of all other nagas and salamanders in the area. Take care not to fight more foes than you can manage.
*Naga warriors often carry [[kite shield]]s and [[tower shield]]s. If you're looking for a shield, you may want to investigate the first floor of the Snake Pit.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], naga warriors dealt 32 base damage in melee, and had a bit more HP.
*Prior to [[0.29]], naga warriors had 25% more HP.
*In [[0.28]], naga warriors were made more likely to get a "[[good item]]" shield.
*In [[0.27]], naga warriors got increased damage (28 -> 32) and [[Battlecry]]. Also, monster weapon penalties were removed, so all monsters attack faster with weapons.
